DOC.brief_summary: In this study, we evaluate the acute coronary syndrome patients to see if there is correlation between platelet activity, genetic polymorphism (CYP2C19 and ABCB1), serum adipokines level, and Clopidogrel responsiveness.
DOC.brief_title: The Correlation Between Genetic Polymorphism, Platelet Activity, Clopidogrel Responsiveness, and Serum Adipokine Concentration in Asian Acute Coronary Syndrome Patients
DOC.criteria: 1. Age > 18 y/o 2. Acute coronary syndrome patients 3. Chronic coronary artery disease patients 4. Healthy volunteers 1. Patient refusal 2. Allergy to Clopidogrel 3. Receive Gp IIb/IIIa inhibitor simultaneously 4. Cancer history 5. Severe renal and liver function impairment 6. Coagulopathy
DOC.keyword: Acute coronary syndrome and chronic coronary artery disease patients
